ctx: intros l m H_inv H_planar H_ring.
exceptions.exn: In environment m : fmap H_inv : inv_hmap m H_planar : planar m H1 : ~ emptyl lam H2 : double_link_list m lam H3 : pre_ring0 m lam H4 : pre_ring1 m lam /\\ pre_ring2 m lam /\\ pre_ring3 m lam Unable to unify "nc (Br ?M2284 (cons ?M2285 ?M2286 lam)) = nc ?M2284 + 1" with "nc m = nc m + 1".

original: intros l m H_inv H_planar H_ring. unfold ring in H_ring. destruct H_ring as [H1 [H2 [H3 H4]]]. induction l. - simpl. apply Jordan1; auto. - simpl. assert (H_inv_b: inv_hmap (Br1 m (fst (first (a :: l))) (snd (first (a :: l))))) by (apply inv_hmap_Br with (l := a :: l); assumption). assert (H_planar_b: planar (Br1 m (fst (first (a :: l))) (snd (first (a :: l))))) by (apply planar_Br with (l := a :: l); assumption). destruct (ring_Br1 m (a :: l) H_inv H_planar H_ring) as [H_empty | H_ring1]. + simpl in H_empty. contradiction. + apply IHl with (1 := H_ring1); auto.
